title: New FCC rules bring broader choice of internet providers for renters
content:
The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) is stirring up competition between internet service providers (ISPs) that service apartments. Currently, most Americans who live in apartments only have one choice of internet providers. Oftentimes it is neither the best nor the cheapest option.

more…

The post New FCC rules bring broader choice of internet providers for renters appeared first on 9to5Mac.
